St._Louis.George Warren Brown School of Social Wor: The George Warren Brown School of Social Work, often referred to as GWB, the Brown School or simply Brown, is one of the world's leading schools for the training of social science researchers. The Brown School offers a Master of Social Work (MSW), a Master of Public Health (MPH), a PhD in Social Work, and a PhD in Public Health Sciences. The social work program is ranked 1st by US News.
